room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: Our family of 5 plus a few friends went yesterday for our daughter's 17th birthday. We attempted the Diamond Heist. We didn't make it out and got busted by the cops but we had an amazing time. We will definitely be visiting again soon! The room was awesome and it had puzzles that everyone in the group was able to solve right down to our 10 year old son.

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: Our family of 5 chose the Diamond Heist for our first time adventure. We ran out of time but got pretty close. And everyone in the family contributed. This St. Louis location is just a few blocks from Gateway Arch. We would come back.Forgot to mention, the staff was super friendly.

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: First time doing an Escape Room. Did the Diamond Heist - medium room. So fun!!! Loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: Had a great time. Have done both rooms. The heist room was more enjoyable in my opinion but all in all a great experience and one I would definitely recommend to others. Look forward to the rooms that are being added.

room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: It was so much fun and the staff was amazing! Very friendly and helpful. Well worth the money and it made you think. I cannot wait to come back and do the Heist. If you have a group in St Louis, you need to do this!
